TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SiteIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class SiteIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class SiteIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: 为代码所源自的网站定义标识权限。

span.span: Defines the identity permission for the Web site from which the code originates.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类，可确保调用方从特定网站。Using this class, it is possible to ensure that callers are from a specific Web site. 仅为从 Url 的 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 协议使用的代码定义站点标识。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站点是之间的字符串"/ /"后的 URL 和以下协议"/"，如果存在，例如，在 URL 中的 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm. 这不包括端口号。This excludes port numbers. 如果给定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站点是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 站点可以完全匹配，或由通配符匹配 ("\*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站点名称字符串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 匹配 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。如果没有通配符，站点名称必须是精确的匹配项。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match. 站点名称字符串 \* 将匹配任何站点，但将与无站点证据的代码不匹配。The site name string \* will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，调用程序集是完全受信任时也如此。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET framework 的版本[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，你可以使用方法，以防止对系统资源的受信任的代码的意外访问。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 现已过时，并对资源的访问现在只能由程序集的授予权限来决定。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制对文件的访问，必须在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码，并将其分配仅对允许代码访问的资源的权限。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的信息，请参阅[如何： 运行部分受信任的代码在沙盒中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md). > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识权限不能有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着，在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为实现的权限接口。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完全受限制的状态不匹配任何站点。The fully restricted state of matches no sites. 此构造函数包含针对与具有其他权限，设计的一致性，但并不十分有用的做法。This constructor is included for consistency with the design of other permissions, but is not useful in practice. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识权限不能有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着，在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为实现的权限接口。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是说，要求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，调用程序集是完全受信任时也如此。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.

exception.span: 参数不是 的有效值。

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，以表示指定的站点标识。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to represent the specified site identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅为从 Url 的 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 协议使用的代码定义站点标识。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站点是之间的字符串"/ /"后的 URL 和以下协议"/"，如果存在，例如，在 URL 中的 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. 这不包括端口号。This excludes port numbers. 如果给定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站点是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 站点可以完全匹配，或由通配符匹配 ("\*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站点名称字符串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 匹配 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。如果没有通配符，站点名称必须是精确的匹配项。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match.

exception.span: 参数不是有效的字符串，也不与有效的通配符站点名称匹配。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid string, or does not match a valid wildcard site name.

Public Overrides Function Copy () As IPermission

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份权限表示对资源或与原始权限相同的站点标识相同的访问权限。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources or the same site identity as the original permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是描述它们都描述了在常见的站点的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the sites they both describe in common. 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 例如，表示对 www.fourthcoffee.com，另一个访问权限表示对访问权限的交集 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 是表示对 www.fourthcoffee.com 访问权限的权限。For example, the intersection of a permission that represents access to www.fourthcoffee.com and one that represents access to \*.fourthcoffee.com is a permission that represents access to www.fourthcoffee.com. 两个相同的站点标识权限的交集是相同的权限。The intersection of two identical site identity permissions is the same permission. （不是通配符） 的两个不同的交集表达式是空的权限。The intersection of two different (not wildcard) expressions is an empty permission. 通配符表达式和匹配的站点的交集是站点。The intersection of a wildcard expression and a matching site is the site. 两个匹配的通配符表达式的交集是更长的时间，更具体的两个表达式。The intersection of two wildcard expressions that match is the longer, more specific of the two expressions.

exception.span: 参数不是 ，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定完全包含在指定权限的站点，则当前的权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a site that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 下表显示的值针对当前权限和指定的权限的值的范围。The following table shows the value of for a range of values of the current permission and the specified permission. |当前权限Current Permission|指定的权限Specified Permission|IsSubsetOfIsSubsetOf| |------------------------|--------------------------|----------------| |www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|`true`| |www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|www.tailspintoys.comwww.tailspintoys.com|`false`| |www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|`true`| |www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|\*.com\*.com|`true`| |\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|www.fourthcoffee.comwww.fourthcoffee.com|`false`| |\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|`true`| |\*.fourthcoffee.com\*.fourthcoffee.com|\*.com\*.com|`true`| |除 `None`Anything except `None`|*|`true`| |`None`|任何内容Anything|`true`|

exception.span: 参数不是 ，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Site { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the current site.
The current site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅为从 Url 的 HTTP、 HTTPS 和 FTP 协议使用的代码定义站点标识。Site identity is only defined for code from URLs with the protocols of HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP. 站点是之间的字符串"/ /"后的 URL 和以下协议"/"，如果存在，例如，在 URL 中的 www.fourthcoffee.com http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。A site is the string between the "//" after the protocol of a URL and the following "/", if present, for example, www.fourthcoffee.com in the URL http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. 这不包括端口号。This excludes port numbers. 如果给定的 url http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/，站点是 www.fourthcoffee.com，不 www.fourthcoffee.com:8000。If a given URL is http://www.fourthcoffee.com:8000/, the site is www.fourthcoffee.com, not www.fourthcoffee.com:8000. 站点可以完全匹配，或由通配符匹配 ("\*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。Sites can be matched exactly, or by a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，站点名称字符串 \*。 fourthcoffee.com 匹配 fourthcoffee.com，以及 www.fourthcoffee.com。如果没有通配符，站点名称必须是精确的匹配项。For example, the site name string \*.fourthcoffee.com matches fourthcoffee.com as well as www.fourthcoffee.com. Without a wildcard, the site name must be a precise match. 站点名称字符串 \* 将匹配任何站点，但将与无站点证据的代码不匹配。The site name string \* will match any site, but will not match code that has no site evidence.

exception.span: 无法检索站点标识，因为它的标识不明确。

span.span: The site identity cannot be retrieved because it has an ambiguous identity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是由当前权限和指定的权限表示表示的所有站点的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the sites represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 例如，表示对 www.fourthcoffee.com，另一个访问权限表示对访问权限的联合 *。 fourthcoffee.com 是表示对访问权限 *。 fourthcoffee.com。For example, the union of a permission that represents access to www.fourthcoffee.com and one that represents access to *.fourthcoffee.com is a permission that represents access to *.fourthcoffee.com. 权限的联合和`null`是不是权限`null`。The union of a permission and `null` is the permission that is not `null`. 该权限的子集和权限的联合是包含子集的权限。The union of a permission and a subset of that permission is the permission that contains the subset. 任何其他组合会导致引发。Any other combination results in an being thrown. 例如，站点标识 www.fourthcoffee.com 站点标识 www.tailspintoys.com 的并集生成的异常因为既不是另一个的子集。For example, the union of the site identity www.fourthcoffee.com and the site identity www.tailspintoys.com results in an exception because neither is a subset of the other.

exception.span: 参数不是 ，而且与当前权限不是同一类型。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
-or-

exception.span: 权限不相等且其中一个不是另一个的子集。

span.span: The permissions are not equal and one is not a subset of the other.
